Setting Value Value value Value
Document Testing that different synonyms for table names work. In general all table names can be both singular and plural ('Keyword' or 'Keywords'). On top of that 'Metadata' is a synonym for 'Setting' and 'User Keyword' for 'Keyword'. Check that:
1) This document is set fot the test suite
2) All tests have correct tags
